name: 3D Happy Bird - Demo
description:
3D Flappy Bird
At this time It's available on windows, android
On 5, Oct, 2020 The game will be available on Android,MacOS,Linux

Currently The game has less features and this is only the demo/base core
Soon It will be full version

Upcoming Game Features: 

  • Shop System
  • Consumes, Models
  • Different Stages ( Red, Night, Day, Rain )
  • In game score / highest Score
